Rulings.Edison:
● Monsters can still be Summoned in Attack Position. 
● Monsters can still change their Battle Positions. They just switch back to Defense immediately.
● If "Caius the Shadow Monarch" is Summoned, it's changed to Defense Position immediately.
After Caius' effect resolves, even if it banished this card, Caius will remain in Defense Position.
Rulings.Tengu:
● Monsters can still be Summoned in Attack Position. 
● Monsters can still change their Battle Positions. They just switch back to Defense immediately.
● If "Caius the Shadow Monarch" is Summoned, it's changed to Defense Position immediately.
After Caius' effect resolves, even if it banished this card, Caius will remain in Defense Position.
Rulings.Goat:
●The effect of Lv Limit - Area B does not use the chain, it is a continuous effect.
●All Lv 4 or higher monsters face-up on the field after Lv Limit - Area B resolves will be in Defense Position. You can change the Battle Position of a Lv 4 or higher monster, but it will immediately be changed back to Defense Position because of Lv Limit - Area B's effect.
●If Lv Limit - Area B is activated while Final Attack Orders is applying, then the most recently resolved effect takes precedence and monsters Lv 4 or higher will be in Defense Position.
●If you Summon “Spell Canceller” while “Lv Limit - Area B” is on the field, “Spell Canceller” negates its effect and is not changed to Defense Position.

Rulings.Base:
1. The effect of "Level Limit - Area B" does not use the chain, it is a continuous effect.
2. All Level 4 or higher monsters face-up on the field after "Level Limit - Area B" resolves will be in Defense Position. You can change the Battle Position of a Level 4 or higher monster, but it will immediately be changed back to Defense Position because of the effect of "Level Limit - Area B".
3. If "Level Limit - Area B" is activated while "Final Attack Orders" is active, then the most recently resolved effect takes precedence and monsters Level 4 or higher will be in Defense Position.
4. If you Summon "Spell Canceller" while "Level Limit - Area B" is on the field, "Spell Canceller" negates its effect and is not changed to Defense Position.

PSCT.Edison: ① Change all Level 4 or higher monsters to Defense Position.
PSCT.Tengu: ① Change all Level 4 or higher monsters to Defense Position.
